Story :

A car crash on a bridge causes Keng and Prae a big trouble in their lives. 
It is shocking when they&#039;re conscious and realize their souls are switched 
into the bodies of each other. It&#039;s even worst when both are the opposite 
sex that having different and particular tastes. Trapped inside each other 
bodies, Keng and Prae must find the way to return to their own bodies, but 
it&#039;s not so easy when many problems keep popping up.
